title: Where can I buy an oblique pen holder online, India (for copperplate nibs)? - Quora

response.answer_text: My personal suggestion would be a Speedball Oblique nib holder which is excellent for copperplate calligraphy. You can buy this at amazon, the link of which I’m stating below : Speedball Oblique Pen Point Holder 9455 However you may also buy a set of Speedball Oblique nib holder along with 6 copperplate nibs ( The Speedball 101). Here’s the link below : Speedball Oblique Pen Set Set Of 6 Thanks for the A2A Happy writing.
A quick search shows that Amazon and Flipkart have products in stock.
